text: Comment to CNN: Yes, right now Biden is leader of the free world, but a couple of years ago our president was on the other team, and not too far down the road, if things don't change radically, we'll be changing teams again. Don't forget that context. That's where Putin has fun. He can screw with our political system, but it appears we have no power in the other direction. We can't give him a problem at home.
